ygData.subject: Mana
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Just discovered that Elven Wine gives a small mana regen boost. My alcohol tolerance is so low though I take an INT hit when I use it, so I only do it
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

Just discovered that Elven Wine gives a small mana regen boost. My alcohol tolerance is so low though I take an INT hit when I use it, so I only do it when mana is really low, so by time I am FM my INT has recovered too. Never thought I would be using alcohol like warriors do for STR boost, so neglected to build alcohol tolerance. But now it is in upper 20's and INT hit is not as bad, and recovers faster. Anyway, it is like a poor cousin to Clarity, but helps a bit when you are soloing and want mana back ASAP.

Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
